title: SpaceX to Offer Insider Shares at Record-Setting Valuation
description: SpaceX is preparing to sell insider shares in a transaction that would value Elon Musk’s rocket and satellite maker at a valuation higher than OpenAI’s record-setting $500 billion, people familiar with the matter said.

title: Wall St. Races to Cut Its Risk From AI’s Borrowing Binge
description:
Wall Street is gearing up to lend massive amounts of money to the biggest players in AI - and simultaneously trying to figure out how to protect itself from any bubble that its financing may be helping to inflate. "Bloomberg Real Yield" roundtable discusses the potential risks to credit. CORRECT: Description of interview has been updated to represent the correct guest and content.

 (Source: Bloomberg)

title: HPE’s AI Servers Ready as Soon Data Centers Are, Says CEO
description: HPE CEO Antonio Neri discusses the company’s earnings as its sales for AI servers fall short. He joins Caroline Hyde and Ed Ludlow on “Bloomberg Tech”. (Source: Bloomberg)
